title: 'Life's too short': US man purchases $395,000 cliffside home despite warnings that it might erode into the ocean
content: David Moot, an American interior painter and designer, acquired a cliffside home on Cape Cod for $395,000 despite warnings about coastal erosion. The three-bedroom house sits only 7.6 metres from a deteriorating cliff. This purchase exemplifies a growing trend of buying scenic properties at significant discounts amid climate change concerns.
summary: David Moot, an American interior painter and designer, acquired a cliffside home on Cape Cod for $395,000 despite warnings about coastal erosion. The three-bedroom house sits only 7.6 metres from a deteriorating cliff. This purchase exemplifies a growing trend of buying scenic properties at significant discounts amid climate change concerns.

title: 'Lessons learned': Stranded astronauts Sunita Williams and Butch Wilmore on Boeing's return to earth
content: NASA astronauts Sunita Williams and Butch Wilmore shared their relief after the Boeing Starliner spacecraft safely landed in New Mexico. During a live press conference from the ISS, they discussed their extended mission, lessons learned, and upcoming handover to Expedition 72 astronauts Nick and Alex. The astronauts are scheduled to return to Earth aboard a SpaceX Crew Dragon in February.
summary: NASA astronauts Sunita Williams and Butch Wilmore shared their relief after the Boeing Starliner spacecraft safely landed in New Mexico. During a live press conference from the ISS, they discussed their extended mission, lessons learned, and upcoming handover to Expedition 72 astronauts Nick and Alex. The astronauts are scheduled to return to Earth aboard a SpaceX Crew Dragon in February.

title: Who was Elijah Vue? Skeletal remains of missing 3-year-old found in Wisconsin
content: Elijah Vue, a three-year-old boy from Wisconsin Dells, vanished in February while under the care of his mother's boyfriend, Jesse Vang. His skeletal remains were found in September near Two Rivers. The community is devastated by the loss. Both his mother and Vang face child neglect charges but have pleaded not guilty.
summary: Elijah Vue, a three-year-old boy from Wisconsin Dells, vanished in February while under the care of his mother's boyfriend, Jesse Vang. His skeletal remains were found in September near Two Rivers. The community is devastated by the loss. Both his mother and Vang face child neglect charges but have pleaded not guilty.

title: Purr-fect banger! Trump's 'they're eating the cats' has now turned into a viral song, watch
content: The South African band Kiffness created a parody song called "Eating the Cats" that mocks former US President Donald Trump's false claim about immigrants eating pets in Springfield, Ohio. The video has gone viral and features edited audio of Trump with auto-tuned animal sounds. Proceeds from streaming will benefit the Clark County SPCA.
summary: The South African band Kiffness created a parody song called "Eating the Cats" that mocks former US President Donald Trump's false claim about immigrants eating pets in Springfield, Ohio. The video has gone viral and features edited audio of Trump with auto-tuned animal sounds. Proceeds from streaming will benefit the Clark County SPCA.

title: AI chatbot that persuades users to stop believing unfounded conspiracy theories
Brazil SC judge seizes $3 million from Elon Musk’s X and Starlink in fines dispute
content: Brazilian Supreme Court Justice Alexandre de Moraes has seized nearly $3 million from the bank accounts of social media platform X and satellite internet provider Starlink, both owned by Elon Musk, to collect unpaid fines. This move has raised legal questions about holding Starlink accountable for X's penalties since they are separate entities.
summary: Brazilian Supreme Court Justice Alexandre de Moraes has seized nearly $3 million from the bank accounts of social media platform X and satellite internet provider Starlink, both owned by Elon Musk, to collect unpaid fines. This move has raised legal questions about holding Starlink accountable for X's penalties since they are separate entities.

title: Houston shocker: Cats cut in half found in East End amid speculative pet-eating theories in Ohio
content: Houston is dealing with a chilling case of animal cruelty as several severed cat bodies have been found in public areas over the past two weeks. The Houston Police Department's Animal Cruelty Unit is investigating these incidents urgently. Additionally, around 50 dead animals were discovered on a property in San Leon, Texas, leading to criminal charges against the owner.
summary: Houston is dealing with a chilling case of animal cruelty as several severed cat bodies have been found in public areas over the past two weeks. The Houston Police Department's Animal Cruelty Unit is investigating these incidents urgently. Additionally, around 50 dead animals were discovered on a property in San Leon, Texas, leading to criminal charges against the owner.

title: Barron Trump, at 18, takes the lead as ‘DeFi Visionary’ in new Trump family crypto platform World Liberty Financial
content: Donald Trump is introducing World Liberty Financial, a cryptocurrency platform overseen by his sons and led by Barron Trump as the DeFi visionary. This venture seeks to transform financial services through blockchain technology. The official announcement is scheduled for September 16 at Mar-a-Lago.
summary: Donald Trump is introducing World Liberty Financial, a cryptocurrency platform overseen by his sons and led by Barron Trump as the DeFi visionary. This venture seeks to transform financial services through blockchain technology. The official announcement is scheduled for September 16 at Mar-a-Lago.

title: Pope Francis on US election: 'Both Trump and Harris are against life, choose the lesser of two evils'
content: Pope Francis criticized US presidential candidates Donald Trump and Kamala Harris for their stances on immigration and abortion. Speaking aboard his plane returning to Rome, he labeled both as 'against life' and urged voters to consider the moral implications of their choices. He emphasized the need for voters to choose the lesser of two evils.
summary: Pope Francis criticized US presidential candidates Donald Trump and Kamala Harris for their stances on immigration and abortion. Speaking aboard his plane returning to Rome, he labeled both as 'against life' and urged voters to consider the moral implications of their choices. He emphasized the need for voters to choose the lesser of two evils.

title: Trump vows 'large deportations' in US amid false claims of Haitians eating pets in Ohio: 'We will start in Springfield'
content: Donald Trump has promised mass deportations from Springfield, Ohio, if re-elected, alleging without evidence that Haitian migrants are consuming pets. Local officials and experts dispute these claims and highlight the migrants' positive impact. Governor Mike DeWine announced a $2.5 million initiative to improve healthcare services strained by the migrant population.
summary: Donald Trump has promised mass deportations from Springfield, Ohio, if re-elected, alleging without evidence that Haitian migrants are consuming pets. Local officials and experts dispute these claims and highlight the migrants' positive impact. Governor Mike DeWine announced a $2.5 million initiative to improve healthcare services strained by the migrant population.

title: Imran Khan blames military for CM disappearance, says Pakistan scene is ‘Yahya Khan Part II’
Sunita Williams addresses bone density loss concerns, shares her workout routine in space
content: Suni said if they do not work out every day, they will lose bone density. Sunita Williams wakes up at 6.30 am while Butch is an early-riser and wakes up at 4.30am. Their exercise regime includes cardio vascular, running on the treadmill, using a machine to perform deadlifts and squats etc.
summary: Suni said if they do not work out every day, they will lose bone density. Sunita Williams wakes up at 6.30 am while Butch is an early-riser and wakes up at 4.30am. Their exercise regime includes cardio vascular, running on the treadmill, using a machine to perform deadlifts and squats etc.

title: Donald Trump reveals what Laura Loomer is to his campaign: "I don't control her'
content: Donald Trump addressed the controversy over Laura Loomer's racist remarks about Kamala Harris, describing Loomer as a 'free spirit.' He emphasized that he does not control her actions and said she is just a supporter. He said he was not aware of Laura Loomer's comments on Kamala Harris but will take a look. .
summary: Donald Trump addressed the controversy over Laura Loomer's racist remarks about Kamala Harris, describing Loomer as a 'free spirit.' He emphasized that he does not control her actions and said she is just a supporter. He said he was not aware of Laura Loomer's comments on Kamala Harris but will take a look. .

title: Sunita Williams, Butch Wilmore to vote for US election from Space: 'Very important duty'
content: Nasa astronauts Sunita Williams and Butch Wilmore Friday said that they are looking forward to cast their ballot in the US election from the International Space Station as their return has been delayed. Answering a question on voting, Wilmore said he sent down his request for a ballot today as it is a very important duty and Nasa makes sure that they are able to cast their votes. Sunita agreed and said she is looking forward to be able to vote from Space.
summary: Nasa astronauts Sunita Williams and Butch Wilmore Friday said that they are looking forward to cast their ballot in the US election from the International Space Station as their return has been delayed. Answering a question on voting, Wilmore said he sent down his request for a ballot today as it is a very important duty and Nasa makes sure that they are able to cast their votes. Sunita agreed and said she is looking forward to be able to vote from Space.

title: 'Dead cat hanging from a tree': Origin of Haitian immigrants row. Everyone heard it
content: Lee said she heard it from a neighbor (Kimberley Newton) who heard it from a friend who heard it from their daughter. The rumor was a cat owner found her dead pet hanging from a tree ready to be skinned, butchered and eaten at a house said to be occupied by Haitian immigrants. But both Lee and Kimberly were not sure about the authenticity of the rumor as they don't know the person who lost the cat.
summary: Lee said she heard it from a neighbor (Kimberley Newton) who heard it from a friend who heard it from their daughter. The rumor was a cat owner found her dead pet hanging from a tree ready to be skinned, butchered and eaten at a house said to be occupied by Haitian immigrants. But both Lee and Kimberly were not sure about the authenticity of the rumor as they don't know the person who lost the cat.

title: US elections getting spicy after 'Loony' Loomer's curry jibe
content: Linda Loomer's provocative comments about Kamala Harris and curry have ignited controversy, prompting questions about Donald Trump's ties with her. Trump's remarks on illegal immigrants and Harris's visit to an anti-Trump spice store have further fueled the debate. Republican leaders are calling for Trump to distance himself from Loomer amid concerns over her influence.
summary: Linda Loomer's provocative comments about Kamala Harris and curry have ignited controversy, prompting questions about Donald Trump's ties with her. Trump's remarks on illegal immigrants and Harris's visit to an anti-Trump spice store have further fueled the debate. Republican leaders are calling for Trump to distance himself from Loomer amid concerns over her influence.

title: Laura Loomer's photo with Donald Trump viral. People ask where's Melania, where's wedding ring
content: As photos of Laura Loomer with Donald Trump went viral amid a major controversy over Loomer's role in Donald Trump's campaign, people asked why Laura and Trump were so closely standing. Social media users asked where Melania Trump was and why Donald Trump was not wearing his wedding ring. Donald Trump, however, never wore any wedding ring or band.
summary: As photos of Laura Loomer with Donald Trump went viral amid a major controversy over Loomer's role in Donald Trump's campaign, people asked why Laura and Trump were so closely standing. Social media users asked where Melania Trump was and why Donald Trump was not wearing his wedding ring. Donald Trump, however, never wore any wedding ring or band.

title: Unruly Australian passenger asked to pay $11,780 for fuel cost as flight had to turn around
content: A Western Australian passenger has been fined $11,780 after his disruptive behavior forced a Jetstar flight from Perth to Sydney to return. The incident led to the cancellation of the flight and overnight accommodation for passengers. The man pleaded guilty to disorderly behavior and failing to comply with safety instructions.
summary: A Western Australian passenger has been fined $11,780 after his disruptive behavior forced a Jetstar flight from Perth to Sydney to return. The incident led to the cancellation of the flight and overnight accommodation for passengers. The man pleaded guilty to disorderly behavior and failing to comply with safety instructions.

title: Despite debate win, Kamala Harris makes no dent in battleground state although 5+ nationwide
content: Kamala Harris experienced a minor poll increase after her debate with Donald Trump, yet the Presidential race stays competitive in key battleground states. Both resumed campaigning; Harris was buoyed by favorable reviews while Trump declined another debate challenge, insisting on his victory despite mixed reactions to his performance.
summary: Kamala Harris experienced a minor poll increase after her debate with Donald Trump, yet the Presidential race stays competitive in key battleground states. Both resumed campaigning; Harris was buoyed by favorable reviews while Trump declined another debate challenge, insisting on his victory despite mixed reactions to his performance.

title: Haitian row: Photographer of viral 'man carrying duck' says he thought it was...
content: The man who took the viral photo of a man carrying a duck came forward and claimed that the photo was not from Springfield but from Ohio's Columbus. He said he regrets posting the photo on Reddit as it became the weapon of the Right-wingers to spread the malicious rumors about Haitian immigrants. He said he posted the photo as he thought it was not something one gets to see every day.
summary: The man who took the viral photo of a man carrying a duck came forward and claimed that the photo was not from Springfield but from Ohio's Columbus. He said he regrets posting the photo on Reddit as it became the weapon of the Right-wingers to spread the malicious rumors about Haitian immigrants. He said he posted the photo as he thought it was not something one gets to see every day.
